messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: After the brilliant result last year in the Referendum, we now have a chance for freedom from the EU but we must be very careful and concerned as to the kind of Brexit we get. So this is your chance to make a difference as to how Redcar is represented and changed. Your vote is important, please don't waste it and be hoodwinked by all this talk of tactical voting, if you vote UKIP you get UKIP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Theresa May has completely failed to control immigration as Home Secretary and since she's been in government immigration has risen by more than 1.8 million people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Wasting Your Money on Foreign Aid
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Theresa May is fully committed to bingeing £14 billion a year of your money on so-called foreign aid.
The Tories have U-turned on their pledge to scrap the hated ECHR. It currently stops us deporting criminals and terrorists and even makes us pay them compensation.
Theresa May won't commit to protecting our fishermen from future Brussels controls.
Since 2010, May's Tories have paid £50 billion of EU membership fees. This should have employed tens of thousands of nurses and carers in our NHS.
The police have been cut by 20,000 officers and armed forces by 30,000 since 2010.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Your vote is important, please don't waste it and be hoodwinked by all this talk of tactical voting, if you vote UKIP you get UKIP. Only UKIP will fight to get the best deal for our Tories.
